Song.title: I Come Running
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Mark Altrogge © 2005 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: F#m7 | A | E | D2 :||]
Verse 1: [D]Jesus, I am [E]blind, be my [F#m | A]light [D]Darkened in my [E]mind, be my [F#m | F#m]wisdom [D]Bend my stubborn [E]will to Your [F#m | A]own [D]Open up my [E]ears to hear Your [F#m | F#m]Spirit Melt my [Bm]conscience once ag[A]ain, help me [Bm]hate the slightest [A]sin And when [E]Satan comes to tempt me
Chorus: I come [F#m]running to You, [A2] [ ]when I [E]fear, when I’m [D]tried I come [F#m]running to You, [A2] [ ]to Your [E]blood, to Your [D]side And [A]there my soul finds [Asus4]rest, [A]there my soul finds r[Asus4]est in [F#m | A2 | A2]You
Verse 2: [D]Shepherd of my [E]soul, lead me [F#m | A]on [D]To the pastures [E]green in Your [F#m | F#m]Scriptures [D]Make me to lie [E]down by waters [F#m | A]still [D]Fill me with Your [E]peace in the [F#m | F#m]tempest I take my [Bm]refuge in Your [A]cross, by Your [Bm]sacrifice I’m [A]washed And when [E]Satan comes accusing
Verse 3: [D]Once I was Your [E]foe, a slave to [F#m | A]sin A [D]stranger to Your [E]love,{,} a hopeless [F#m | F#m]outcast But [D]You have brought me [E]near, I’m bought with [F#m | A]blood Now [D]I’m Your precious [E]child,{,} an heir with [F#m | F#m]Jesus You pour [Bm]heav’n into my [A]soul, Your wondrous [Bm]love, it overfl[A]ows And I [E]marvel how You love me
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 jesus i am blind be my light darkened in my mind be my wisdom bend my stubborn will to your own open up my ears to hear your spirit melt my conscience once again help me hate the slightest sin and when satan comes to tempt me chorus i come running to you when i fear when im tried i come running to you to your blood to your side and there my soul finds rest there my soul finds rest in you verse 2 shepherd of my soul lead me on to the pastures green in your scriptures make me to lie down by waters still fill me with your peace in the tempest i take my refuge in your cross by your sacrifice im washed and when satan comes accusing verse 3 once i was your foe a slave to sin a stranger to your love a hopeless outcast but you have brought me near im bought with blood now im your precious child an heir with jesus you pour heavn into my soul your wondrous love it overflows and i marvel how you love me
